snippet.title: Krakout Unlimited 2   ²⁰⁰⁴
snippet.description:
Totally new visuals:
1024x768 at 32 Bit colordepth
Completly new, 3D rendered graphics
Supports 3D accelerators for advanced light and transparency effects
Krakout Unlimited 2 has been written from scratch and runs even smoother than the first part although the resolution is higher

Enhanced gameplay:
Network support - play as team or as opponents
As many balls as you can catch
30 special bricks - from missed classics like magnet or missle to new dangers - experience a totally new gamplay when for example the wall starts to push the bricks in your direction
Twice as many kinds of enemies - from "old friends" with new 3D look to absolutly new bad guys

Many details improved:
Upload your highscore with a single mouse click
Physics engine: Realistic bouncing balls, gravity, "swimming" fishes and even better ball control
Play left or right, play with a blue or a pink paddle and even with a female ball
8 brand-new tracks from Reptile + Sky (plus complete soundtrack of Krakout Unlimited 1 and support for your own Audio CDs as background music)

And of course...
UNLIMITED, always new levels (with new variations)
Selectable difficulty
3D soundsystem and cartoon soundeffects
Family-friendly

System Requirements
Windows 95/98/ME/2000/XP
Pentium II 266 Mhz or better
32 MB RAM
25 MB of free, uncompressed harddisc
100% DirectX 7-compatible sound card
100% DirectX 7-compatible graphics card with at least 8 MB VRAM (16 MB recommended)
3D accelerator recommended (not required for smooth gameplay)
DirectX 8 or higher
